chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nf m1 = match k with | zero => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in Z.add (nf m0) (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | one => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in Z.add (nf m0) (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z For Zpos: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For Zneg: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
nf = fix nf (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nf m0 + 1 | L m0 zero x y => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1) | L m0 one x y => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1) end : fmap -> Z
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L
expf_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {expf m x y} + {~ expf m x y}
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
nc_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nc m1 = nc m
nc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m0 := B m k x in nc m0 = nc m + (if eqc_dec m0 x (A m k x) then 0 else 1)
eqc_B_CN : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
eqc_B_CS : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t -> eqc m z t
eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let xk := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in eqc m z t < -> eqc m0 z t \/ eqc m0 z x /\ eqc m0 xk t \/ eqc m0 z xk /\ eqc m0 x t
nc = fix nc (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nc m0 + 1 | L m0 _ x y => nc m0 - (if eqc_dec m0 x y then 0 else 1) end : fmap -> Z
A_1 = fix A_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
nv = fix nv (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nv m0 + 1 | L m0 zero _ _ => nv m0 | L m0 one _ _ => nv m0 - 1 end : fmap -> Z
ne = fix ne (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => ne m0 + 1 | L m0 zero _ _ => ne m0 - 1 | L m0 one _ _ => ne m0 end : fmap -> Z
B_1 = fix B_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B_1 m0 k y) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then m0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
D = fix D (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else I (D m0 x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => L (D m0 x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dart -> fmap
plf = fix plf (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 _ _ _ => plf m0 | L m0 zero x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y) | L m0 one x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 x (cA m0 zero y)) end : fmap -> Prop
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
nd = fix nd (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nd m0 + 1 | L m0 _ _ _ => nd m0 end : fmap -> Z
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
Iter_cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in Iter (cF (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))) i z = Iter (cF m) i z
nv_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> nv (B m k x) = nv m + (if eq_dim_dec k one then 1 else 0)
ne_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> ne (B m k x) = ne m + (if eq_dim_dec k zero then 1 else 0)
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
BinIntDef.Z.div = fun a b : Z => let (q, _) := BinIntDef.Z.div_eucl a b in q : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_1_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
dim_opp = fun k : dim => match k with | zero => one | one => zero end : dim -> dim
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)

``` 
intros m k x Hmap Hsucc y m0 m1.
unfold nf, A, B, L.
destruct k.
- simpl. 
  unfold y, m0.
  rewrite cA_1_eq_aux by assumption.
  destruct (expf_dec m x (cA_1 m one x)); simpl; lia.
- simpl.
  unfold y, m0.
  rewrite cA_eq_aux by assumption.
  destruct (expf_dec m (cA m0 zero y) x); simpl; lia.
```

original: intros m k x Hmap Hsucc y m0 m1. unfold nf, A, B, L. destruct k. - simpl. unfold y, m0. rewrite cA_1_eq_aux by auto. destruct (expf_dec m x (cA_1 m one x)); simpl; lia. - simpl. unfold y, m0. rewrite cA_eq_aux by auto. destruct (expf_dec m (cA m0 zero y) x); simpl; lia.
